title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about limited text data focusing on data augmentation and semi-supervised learning

Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about limited text data focusing on data augmentation and semi-supervised learning. These articles cover various aspects of the topics, including data augmentation techniques, semi-supervised learning algorithms, and their applications in various domains
Data Augmentation for Deep Learning: A Survey
This paper provides an overview of data augmentation techniques and their applications in deep learning
Data Augmentation for Semi-Supervised Text Classification
This paper discusses data augmentation techniques for semi-supervised learning in text classification
Semi-Supervised Learning for Text Classification: A Survey
This paper provides an overview of semi-supervised learning for text classification and its applications
Semi-Supervised Learning for Text Classification with Word Embeddings
This paper discusses the use of word embeddings for semi-supervised learning in text classification

This paper discusses the use of graph-based features for semi-supervised learning in text classification

This paper discusses the use of graph convolutional networks for semi-supervised learning in text classification
